song.title: Forever (Bethel)
song.lyrics:
[1] .G D The moon and stars they wept . Em The morning sun was dead . C The Savior of the world was fallen || .G D His body on the cross . Em His blood poured out for us . C The weight of every curse upon Him
[p] .G D The ground began to shake . Em The stone was rolled away . C His perfect love could not be overcome || .G D Now death where is your sting? . Em Our resurrected King . C Has rendered you defeated --- [C] .G D Forever He is glorified .Em C Forever He is lifted high .G D Forever He is risen . Em C He is alive, He is alive
[2] .G D One final breath He gave . Em As heaven looked away . C The Son of God was laid in darkness || .G D A battle in the grave . Em The war on death was waged . C The power of hell forever broken
[B] .G D We sing hallelujah . Em We sing hallelujah . C We sing hallelujah . G The Lamb has overcome
song.presentation: 1 2 P C P C B C
